title: RBI grants Payment Aggregator license to SabPaisa
description: SabPaisa, a payment solutions provider, has received final approval from RBI to function as a Payment Aggregator under the Payments and Settlement Systems Act, 2007. Pathikrit Dasgupta, the CEO, highlighted the milestone, dedication to excellence, and aspiration to emerge as a premier fintech entity in India.
